name: PsychoFlesh
description:
Delve into the dark corners of a mind twisted and corrupted by madness. They are watching you, they are calling you, they are chasing you...

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Camera

LMB - Light Torch

Game made for Summer of Screams GameJam by:

- Carlos Montamarta (@Montyrell)

- Juan Ramón Espinosa (@JRamonEspinosa)

- Carolina Pereda

- Marina Alonso
